articles.title: Emerson Electric (EMR): Is the Automation Leader Quietly Undervalued After Its Recent Multi‑Year Share Price Climb?
articles.mainIdea: Emerson Electric (EMR): Is the Automation Leader Quietly Undervalued After Its Recent Multi‑Year Share Price Climb?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Emerson Electric (EMR): Is the Automation Leader Quietly Undervalued After Its Recent Multi‑Year Share Price Climb?. Emerson Electric (EMR) has quietly added to its steady track record this year, with the stock up about 9% over the past year and roughly 48% across the past 3 years. See our latest analysis for Emerson Electric. That mix of a recent pullback alongside an 8.8% year to date share price return and a near 48% three year total shareholder return suggests momentum is cooling slightly rather than reversing, as investors weigh steady growth against valuation. If Emerson’s measured climb has you...

articles.title: IntelePeer Agentic AI Trend Report Cites Trust, Day-One Value, Integration, and Analytics as Critical Success Factors in Healthcare Deployments
articles.mainIdea: IntelePeer Agentic AI Trend Report Cites Trust, Day-One Value, Integration, and Analytics as Critical Success Factors in Healthcare Deployments
articles.summary: Business Wire: IntelePeer Agentic AI Trend Report Cites Trust, Day-One Value, Integration, and Analytics as Critical Success Factors in Healthcare Deployments. DANIA BEACH, Fla., December 22, 2025--IntelePeer today released a new executive outlook report that offers actionable insights for healthcare organizations to consider in successfully implementing Agentic AI into their workflows in 2026. It suggests that secure, compliant Agentic AI automation solutions will become critical requirements to ensure profitability and resilience in the face of staffing shortages, rising costs, and patient expectations for digital engagement.
